title: uncaught typeerror: cannot read property 'message' of undefined when uploading via webinterface
body:
hi, i've got the following configuration: nginx 1.2.8: http://pastebin.com/9fm4qt8z mysql 5.5.30: http://pastebin.com/yy9axcgc php-fpm 5.4.13: http://pastebin.com/fpdctgwa linux debian 6 32-bit i'm using owncloud 5.0.4 - downloaded here: http://download.owncloud.org/community/owncloud-5.0.4.zip i've got 2 issues, one of which (i think) doesn't matter? 
refused to execute inline script because it violates the following content security policy directive: "script-src 'self' 'unsafe-eval'".
 onloadwff.js:493
run_custom_js onloadwff.js:493
hookallformsubmits onloadwff.js:135
evalscriptsinframe onloadwff.js:131
(anonymous function) onloadwff.js:132
i believe the above is caused by a chrome extension. if i use incognito mode with all extensions disabled, this error disappears. now the second error is the annoying one - i am unable to upload anything through the webinterface. it starts uploading, and once it is done uploading the following error shows up in the chrome console: 
uncaught typeerror: cannot read property 'message' of undefined files.js:418
(anonymous function) files.js:418
o core.js:15
p.firewith core.js:16
w core.js:78
d core.js:84
the uploaded file never appears to be fully uploaded. when i refresh the page it's not uploaded. i asked about this on irc, they told me to post it here. please let me know if you need any additional info. thanks!
